title: Ron Burgundy's Stand-Up Debut | Colbert Classic
description:
Legendary local newsman Ron Burgundy (portrayed by the incomparable Will Ferrell) took over late night TV for one night in August 2019, and The Late Show got his exclusive debut stand-up comedy set right on the Ed Sullivan stage. Listen as Burgundy tells Stephen Colbert why the Ferris Bueller Report is his pick for the top news story of 2019.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
